swap(ArrayList<Integer>) - Method in class sdds.lab1.task1.Encrypt
swap function performs swapping of indexes by swapping 0th index with 2nd and 1st index with 3rd so that the encryption logic is unbreachable.
swap(ArrayList<String>) - Method in class sdds.lab1.task1.Decrypt
swap function performs swapping of indexes by swapping 0th index with 2nd and 1st index with 3rd so that the decryption logic is unbrechable.
